nodes.text: PA-LT4 was a white and gold plated A-LT Utility Droid that was owned by the criminal Crimson Dawn syndicate during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In 10 BBY, it was one of a team of droids serving food in the lounge of the First Light, a yacht owned by Crimson Dawn's leader Dryden Vos. As the vessel landed on the planet Vandor, PA-LT4 had a fresh fruit assortment in the temperature-controlled serving tray atop its body and did its best to remain inconspicuous and not get underfoot. The droid was equipped with two precision engineered traction treads.
PA-LT4 first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story, and was first named in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
